short-title.#text:
Natomas Basin Flood Protection
			 Improvements Act of 2013

text.#text: This Act may be cited as the

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#tail:
, acting through the Chief of Engineers, to construct
			 improvements to flood damage reduction facilities adjacent to the American and
			 Sacramento Rivers in the vicinity of Sacramento, California, substantially in
			 accordance with the report of the Chief of Engineers entitled

quote.#tail:
, and dated December 30, 2010, at an estimated
			 total cost of $1,389,500,000, with an estimated Federal cost of $921,200,000
			 and an estimated non-Federal cost of $468,300,000.
quote.#text:
American
			 River Watershed (Common Features) Project, Natomas Basin, Sacramento and Sutter
			 Counties, California

section 101(a)(1) of

current-chamber.#text: IN THE SENATE OF THE UNITED STATES

official-title.#text:
To authorize improvements to flood damage reduction
